mapper.select: SELECT * FROM prksttusinfo where prkPlceEntrcLa BETWEEN #{lat} - 0.008 AND #{lat} + 0.008 AND prkPlceEntrcLo BETWEEN #{lng} - 0.008 AND #{lng} + 0.008
mapper.insert: insert into prksttusinfo(prkCenterId, prkPlceNm, prkPlceAdres, prkPlceEntrcLa, prkPlceEntrcLo, prkCmprtCo) values(#{prkCenterId}, #{prkPlceNm}, #{prkPlceAdres}, #{prkPlceEntrcLa}, #{prkPlceEntrcLo}, #{prkCmprtCo})
